chapters.title: Prologue: Fortress of the Light
chapters.info: Dain Bornhald, p. 16 (4)—Son of Geofram Bornhald. Jaret Byar was sent to tell him how his father had died. Dain was the leader of the band of Whitecloaks that stopped Verin, Egwene, Elayne, Nynaeve, and Hurin near Tar Valon. See also Bornhald, Geofram.
